summary: In this chapter, Brené Brown expresses profound gratitude to the diverse individuals and teams that contributed significantly to the creation of her book. She highlights the inspiring role of her collaborators, friends, and family, acknowledging their support, courage, and influence. Through heartfelt messages, Brown emphasizes the importance of teamwork, community, and connection in bringing her vision to life. This chapter serves as a reminder of the collective effort behind individual achievements. It reflects her appreciation for the courage and authenticity shown by those around her.

slides.section_body: In this chapter, I pause to reflect on the immense support I received throughout this journey. It's a reminder that no one succeeds alone; it takes a village to bring a vision to life.
slides.quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues but the parent of all others.

slides.section_body: I am deeply grateful to the BBEARG team for their dedication and courage. Each member has played a crucial role, reminding me daily to be brave in this work.
slides.quote: Together we are braver and stronger.

slides.section_body: A special thank you to my editor, Ben Greenberg, for bringing laughter and clarity into my thoughts. Your guidance has been invaluable.
slides.quote: An editor is the best kind of collaborator.

slides.section_body: Working with the Random House team has been a privilege. Their wholehearted approach and dedication have made the writing process a joyous one.
To my wonderful agent Jennifer Rudolph Walsh, your belief in me has been a constant source of motivation. Thank you for your unwavering support.
slides.quote: Having someone believe in you can change everything.

slides.section_body: Thank you to the DesignHaus Team for your creativity and artistic vision. Your contributions have brought my ideas to life beautifully.
slides.quote: Art and design are the heartbeats of storytelling.

slides.section_body: My heartfelt thanks to the close family and friends who support me unconditionally. You provide laughter and perspective that keep me grounded.
Friendship enriches our lives, and I am thankful for those who challenge me and keep it real. Together, we navigate this journey.

slides.section_title: A Message to My Loved Ones
slides.section_body: To my family, you are the core of my heart. Your love fuels my purpose and passion. Thank you for the everyday joy you bring.
slides.quote: Family is the light in our lives.

slides.section_body: This chapter is a tribute to the power of connection and collaboration. Each person has shaped this book and my life in profound ways.
slides.quote: Connections are what make our journeys meaningful.
